objects.query: SELECT $$Name$Description$AWS_Business_Hour_External_ID__c, Id, Name, Description, Channel_Type__c, AWS_Business_Hour_External_ID__c, TimeZone FROM OperatingHours
SELECT $$OperatingHoursId$DayOfWeek, Id, Type, OperatingHoursId, DayOfWeek, StartTime, EndTime, WorkTypeGroup.Name FROM TimeSlot
SELECT $$Name$ActvityDate, Id, Name, Description, ActivityDate, IsAllDay, IsRecurrence FROM Holiday
SELECT $$OperatingHoursId$HolidayId, Id, OperatingHoursId, HolidayId, DateAndTime FROM OperatingHoursHoliday
